name: fluXtore Funnel Builder for WordPress – Earn More with Highly Converting Sales Funnels
author: AmazeWP

sections.description:
fluXtore is the #1 WordPress Funnel Builder
fluXtore is the lightest and affordable Funnel Builder for WordPress. With fluXtore building your Sales Funnels has never been easier (and funnier!). Thanks to fluXtore all the Sales Funnels are just a click away!

fluXtore has been designed to help you build beautiful Sales Funnels without wasting time in thinking of a strategy and without wasting money in hiring a web agency.

USE FLUXTORE TO CREATE

  • Amazing landing pages
  • Highly converting checkout pages (without passing through the cart!)
  • Order bumps to increase your earnings
  • Upsells and Downsells offers
  • Custom Thank You pages

WITH FLUXTORE YOU CAN

  • Sell Digital Product
  • Sell Physical Products
  • Sell Online Courses
  • Sell Event Tickets
  • Sell Services

WHY A SALES FUNNEL?

In a normal e-commerce your customers just choose a product from a list of products and then proceed to purchase it and that’s it!
With fluXtore not only purchasing it is easier thanks to the removal of the cart step, but it lets you increase your sales accompanying in a real purchase journey.
fluXtore enables the power of Sales Funnel and helps you present your products with beautifully designed Landing Pages studied to attract customers to purchase your products.
Furthermore, fluXtore gives you the ability to present other products during the checkout (Order Bumps). After the customer purchases it is not over!
You can now present the customer with more related products and choose what to show next depending on whether they choose to purchase the Upsold product or not: amazing!

FLUXTORE AMAZING FEATURES

  • Prebuild beautiful Templates:
    With fluXtore creating funnels has never been easier: thanks to our built-in templates you can create funnels with few clicks!

  • The power of Elementor:
    Thanks to the power of Elementor you can easily customize the imported templates! Elementor Pro is not required (but supported)!

  • Easy Checkout:
    Thanks for fluXtore you will be able to go straight to the checkout without passing from the cart.
    This method helps you increase revenue simplifying the checkout process for the customers.

  • Checkout customization:
    fluXtore gives you the ability to customize your checkout forms.
    Not only you can choose whether a field should be present or not, you can also choose if it should occupy 1 or 2 columns and you can create custom fields also!

  • Analytics:
    With the fluXtore built-in analytics, analyze and improve your sales is now an easy job!
sections.installation:
1. Upload fluXtore.zip to the /wp-content/plugins/ directory
  2. Activate the plugin through the ‘Plugins’ menu in WordPress
  3. Make sure to install Elementor and Woocommerce
sections.faq:
Does fluXtore work with my payment gateway?

fluXtore actually works with PayPal and Stripe implementations by WooCommerce.
If you require other payment gateways you can contact our support to make a request.

Is there a Pro version of fluXtore?

fluXtore provides a Pro version downloadable after purchasing a licence at https://fluxtore.com/pricing.
With fluXtore Pro you’ll be able to create Order Bumps, add Upsell / Downsell steps to your funnels and have better data analysis and more!

How many sales funnels can I create with fluXtore\?

On the free tier the limit is 5.
If you need more you can check out fluXtore Pro at https://fluxtore.com/pricing.

  • Dynamic template system introduced (no more need to update the plugin to get new templates)

Version 1.3.1 – Wednesday – 02nd November 2022

Version 1.0.5 – Friday – 18th February 2022

Version 1.0.0 – Friday, 26th November 2021

  • Initial Release
sections.reviews:
User friendly funnel builder

By latifmiah on August 8, 2023

This is an easy to use funnel builder !!! I have never built an funnel in my life and I was impressed with the outcome!!

The developer is super amazing, I had a minor issue and he jumpped into a Zoom call and fixed the issue within minutes.

Amazing funnel builder

By Thomas Cocchiara (thomassquall) on October 12, 2022

I've been using this plugin for quite a lot now and I have to say, it is one of the best on the market so far

Good funnel builder

By serviziwp on August 19, 2022

Easy to use, easy to setup. Very good tool!!

Super easy funnel setup!

By lndrstrll on March 22, 2022

Thanks to fluXtore I was able to create a funnel in no time with just a very simple few steps, totally recommend.
